name: The Sheep Shall Inherit
description:
Tragedy strikes a country farm as the owner suffers an early demise. The sheep plan to elect one of their own to hold the position of dictator! Smooth talk your way to victory in this interactive political dating sim and choice game hybrid!

Controls

------------

Space: Advance dialogue and title screen

Click: Press buttons

Credits

-----------

Benjamin Eckert - Lead Developer

Kelly Newell - Lead Artist
